title: Fiora can be reworked but Graves cant even have a cigar
body: Riot pls return fiora's hair and splash art cus she's very ugly but very strong{{champion:114}}

replies.body: Gragas can get drunk, but Graves can't have a cigar.
Tahm promoted eating friends, but graves cant have a bloody cigar
Lol she is now prettier but harder to use, fucking tool. ecks dee
